title: Rush - Vapor Trails Remixed [320k MP3]
description:
Vapor Trails Remixed is a hard rock album by the Canadian rock band Rush and produced by David Bottrill as a remixed version of Rush's 2002 album Vapor Trails. The remixed version entered at #35 on the Billboard 200 chart. The remixed album was released by Atlantic Records and Rhino Entertainment on September 27, 2013 for the iTunes library. The album's playlist is identical to that of Vapor Trails, but the songs have remixed audio to eliminate the compression that affected the original album. Both the band and the fans were unhappy with the way the original album's overall sonic production wound up. Due to the fans' insistence, and the positive response from the remixes of "One Little Victory" and "Earthshine" featured on Retrospective III, Rush and Bottrill remixed the entire album. Vapor Trails Remixed will also be included in the box-set of Atlantic Studio Albums.

Track Listing [320k MP3]

All lyrics written by Neil Peart, all music composed by Alex Lifeson and Geddy Lee.
